&

Work

OPENRECORD

OPEN MUSIC COLLECTIONS

OpenRecord lets music lovers create collaborative playlists with just a url. Add songs from YouTube & Soundcloud to collections like /ryan for living playlists with no login required.

NEAT

VISUAL COLLECTIONS OF MULTIMEDIA & RESOURCES

Neat was a tool for designers to organize their inspiration and design resources. Users could create collections of images, videos, and websites that would embed for easy access.

VUMBLE

THE LEADERBOARD FOR ONLINE VIDEO

Vumble was an easier way for video viewers to discover and enjoy all the best videos from across Reddit without ads or interruptions.

RAINBOW

DISCOVER MUSIC YOUR FRIENDS LIKE

A web and soon to be mobile app that helps people discover what their friends are liking on Soundcloud.

FAST ROPE LABS

LET'S BUILD SOMETHING AMAZING

Worked in tandem with Fast Rope's design team to architect and implement their new website in React.

HUMBLE.VC

A BETTER APPROACH TO VENTURE CAPITAL

Redesigned the humble team's website in Sketch and built out the service in Wordpress for accessible content management.
